Skin in the game.@AFP‚Äôs Vyacheslav Oseledko photographs riders competing in the traditional Central Asian sport of Kok-Boru (Gray Wolf) or Buzkashi (Goat Grabbing) in Uch-Emchek, Kyrgyzstan. Players compete for points by throwing a sheep or goat carcass or stuffed skin into a‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/iKTnmAl0zm

item.description:
US Vice President Kamala Harris has urged an immediate ceasefire in Gaza, upping the pressure on key ally Israel as heavy fighting rages in the Palestinian territory.

Harris's comments are the most forceful to date by a US administration officialhttps://t.co/UKj7n0WUk6 pic.twitter.com/nnJ0cTZiLd

item.description:
China's economy of 'great concern' as annual political conclave kicks off in Beijing.
